alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sierra County through 515 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of San Miguel, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuchillo, San Miguel, Upper Palomas Canyon, Chise and Las Placitas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
